title: Ген українців
overview: Patrons, world-famous writers, inventors, brilliant composers and participants in liberation struggles – from the Ukrainian Sich Riflemen to fighters of the Ukrainian Galician Army, Ukrainian Insurgent Army and heroes of the modern Russo-Ukrainian War. All of them were united by the author's project of Iryna Farion "Gene of Ukrainians". About ups and downs, victories and defeats, loyalty and betrayal.
